alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 17 at 3:42AM EST until February 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow expected, with some freezing drizzle possible early. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Calhoun and Jackson counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions developing through the day. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some freezing drizzle will be possible later this morning as rain tapers off, and as temperatures drop below freezing. Accumulating snow will then develop this afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
